item.title: 解决Velero报错: failed to list daemonset pods: client rate limiter Wait returned an error: context deadline exceeded
item.description: 使用VeleroFSB备份集群的时候, 遇到了一些错误, 导致整个备份任务没有成功, 状态: PartiallyFailed: failed to list daemonset pods: client rate limiter Wait returned an error: context deadline exceeded
